getPrice().return: The price as a fixed-point number with 18 decimals.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAdjustment(address,uint256).details: Allows the owner to set an adjustment to an oracle source.

params.adjustment: The adjustment to set when reading from the oracle.
params.oracle: The oracle to apply the adjustment to.

setRoute(address,address).details: Allows the owner to set a route for a particular sender.

params.oracle: The oracle to route the sender to.
params.sender: The sender to set the route for.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getPrice().notice: Returns the price of the underlying asset relative to the margin token.

userdoc.notice: P1Oracle that reads the price from a Maker V2 Oracle.
